EmailTemplate.subject: BLACK FRIDAY OFFER : Discover what's HOT at HAT
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> HONEYWELL AEROSPACE TRADING NOVEMBER 2017 LEARN FROM OUR EXPERTS WHAT'S HOT AT HAT. THE OFFER IS VALID NOV 17-NOV 21 ONLY! Get in touch with our experts and find out the prices for the BLACK FRIDAY LIMITED OFFER (prices are valid for orders placed November 17-November 21 and are limited to stock availability). This is the time to place your orders for the following part numbers or any of our extensive stock. LINDA KODRAZI
EMAIL: Linda.kodrazi@honeywell.com <[[mailto:Linda.kodrazi@honeywell.com]]> MOBILE: +420 734 644 250 TERRITORY: Southern Europe (Spain, Portugal, Italy, Cyprus, Greece, Malta, Turkey, Balkans), Denmark, Pakistan MAGDA BLOUIN
